mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, id, subject, content, notice, hitCount, created) VALUES(#{num}, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice}, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT n.num, notice, n.id, name, subject, hitCount, created, IFNULL(fileCount, 0) FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.id = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num = f.num WHERE notice = 1 ORDER BY num DESC
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.id = m.id
